elements.name: User can see the header Insight when navigates to Insight page

steps.name: User is on the Insight page

elements.name: User can navigate to various business type successfully

steps.name: User is on the Insight page
User clicks on filter by business and selects the business type using value "octopus-energy"
User can see the results filtered by Octopus Energy and see the text "Octopus Energy" displayed in the results

elements.name: User can navigate to CEO's blog page successfully

steps.name: User is on the Insight page
User clicks on the blog link
User successfully navigate to blog page and verifies the text"Simon says"

elements.name: User can search in the search bar

steps.name: User is on the Insight page
User clicks on the search link
User enters the text to search for "Octopus Real estate"
User can see search results and sees the text displayed ""

elements.name: User can access the full article by clicking on read more tab

steps.name: User is on the Insight page
User clicks on read more tab
